name: HALT (itch)
description:
With the arrival of a terrorist supergroup, a detective underdog must protect the city - or question everything.

THIS IS HALT.

Welcome to “The City” of New Memories, a mysterious, neon-lit utopia with mass amnesia - home to the HALT Department.  Lead the investigation on a strange gang of terrorists as you shoot through baddies, combine crazy ammo types, and get into wacky misadventures with your friends. Follow orders and fight back - or figure out why. It’s up to you.

HALT is a story-driven run-&-gun platformer that combines classic RPG-style gameplay with intense arcade action-platforming.
